component.name: Kuro
component.summary: An elegant Microsoft ToDo desktop client

description.p: Kuro is an unofficial, featureful, open source, community-driven, free Microsoft To-Do app for Linux.

ul.li: ToDo URLs will no longer open in Chrome and will keep themselves in app.
bgDanger and fontColorDanger can now be specified in custom themes to target the danger buttons specifically while keeping fontColorWarning for the rest of the UI text.
Links are no longer opening in Electron, they should use the OS browser instead now
Fix suggestions background in custom theme
Fixed the exit keybind not being implemented
New setting/shortcut to invert task position
